title: Bobby Gives Official Statement on Shootings + Movie Quote Fantasy Draft + Eddie Lost His Son Over the Weekend
itunes:title: Bobby Gives Official Statement on Shootings + Movie Quote Fantasy Draft + Eddie Lost His Son Over the Weekend
description:
Bobby gives his thoughts on the 2 tragic shootings that occurred over the weekend. We do our Movie Quote fantasy draft and Eddie tells us how he lost his son on Saturday.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
